Identification.LongTitle: Regulations prescribing provisions of Acts of Parliament and Regulations made pursuant to any such Act that confer powers, duties or functions on federal authorities or on the Governor in Council, the exercise of which requires an Environmental Assessment

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of the Environment, pursuant to paragraphs 59(f) and (g) of the Canadian Environmental Assessment Act*, is pleased hereby to make the annexed Regulations prescribing provisions of Acts of Parliament and regulations made pursuant to any such Act that confer powers, duties or functions on federal authorities or on the Governor in Council, the exercise of which requires an environmental assessment, effective on the day on which section 59 of the Canadian Environmental Assessment Act comes into force.

Section.Text: These Regulations may be cited as the Law List Regulations.

The provisions of an Act set out in Part I of Schedule I and a regulation set out in Part II of that Schedule are prescribed for the purposes of paragraph 5(1)(d) of the Canadian Environmental Assessment Act.
The provisions of an Act set out in Schedule II are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 5(2) of the Canadian Environmental Assessment Act.

ScheduleFormHeading.Label: SCHEDULE I
ScheduleFormHeading.TitleText: Provisions of Acts and Regulations That Confer Powers, Duties or Functions on Federal Authorities

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: subsection 5.9(2) only for exemptions with respect to the operation of an aircraft at a true Mach number of 1 or greater

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: subsection 10(3), as delegated by the Governor in Council Authority Delegation Order

Text.XRefExternal: Canada–Newfoundland and Labrador Atlantic Accord Implementation Act

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: paragraph 138(1)(b), except for an authorization with respect to

Provision.Label: (i)
Provision.Text: a physical activity referred to in section 19.1 of the schedule to the Inclusion List Regulations that relates to a marine or freshwater seismic survey, or

Provision.Label: (ii)
Provision.Text: an offshore exploratory drilling project within the meaning of the Comprehensive Study List Regulations
if an environmental impact statement in respect of the activity or project was submitted to the Board on or before July 28, 2003

Text.XRefExternal: Canada-Nova Scotia Offshore Petroleum Resources Accord Implementation Act

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: paragraph 142(1)(b), except for an authorization with respect to

Provision.Label: (i)
Provision.Text: a physical activity referred to in section 19.1 of the schedule to the Inclusion List Regulations that relates to a marine or freshwater seismic survey, or

Provision.Label: (ii)
Provision.Text: an offshore exploratory drilling project within the meaning of the Comprehensive Study List Regulations
if an environmental impact statement in respect of the activity or project was submitted to the Board on or before July 28, 2003

Text.XRefExternal: Canada Oil and Gas Operations Act

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: section 32, where the review, rescission, variation or re-hearing relates to a decision, order or application made under subsection 98(2), 99(3), 101(3), 116(4), 127(2) or 138(2)

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: paragraph 5.1(3)(b) in respect of authorizations by the Minister for scientific purposes

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: paragraph 14(6)(a), including where approval under that paragraph is given in accordance with subsection 18(2) or (3)

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: paragraph 14(6)(b), including where approval under subparagraph (b)(i) or (ii) is given in accordance with subsection 18(2) or (3)

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: subsection 24(2) in respect of the issue or amendment of a licence

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: paragraph 37(2)(c) in respect of the issue of a licence

Provision.Label: (c)
Provision.Text: paragraph 37(2)(d) in respect of the amendment of a licence

Text.XRefExternal: Chlorine Tank Car Unloading Facilities Regulations
Federal Mobile PCB Treatment and Destruction Regulations

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: subsection 160(1.1), in respect of the issue of a permit required by paragraph 11(1)(a) or 12(1)(a)

Text.XRefExternal: Liquefied Petroleum Gases Bulk Storage Regulations
National Parks of Canada Businesses Regulations
National Parks of Canada Lease and Licence of Occupation Regulations
Wood Buffalo National Park Game Regulations

Footnote.Text: The italicized number shown in parentheses under the item number is the corresponding item number in the French version of this Schedule.

table.title: Provisions of Acts that Confer Powers, Duties or Functions on the Governor in Council

Provision.Label: (c)
Provision.Text: paragraphs 36(5)(a) to (e), where the regulation made pursuant to those paragraphs contains a provision that limits the application of the regulation to a named site

Footnote.Text: The italicized number shown in parentheses under the item number is the corresponding item number in the French version of this Schedule.
